subject: PREL
title: Public Relations Principles
description: Presents the principles, history, and methods of public relations; processes of influencing public opinion; responsibilities of the public relations practitioner; and analyses of public relations programs. Through case studies and class discussions, offers students an opportunity to confront real-life ethical dilemmas and learn to apply ethical frameworks to evaluate and resolve them.

subject: PREL
title: Public Relations Practice
description: Demonstrates practices and techniques employed in the field including organization of events and functions. Studies campaign planning, research, and media relationships.
